page.title: 20THE CONTRIBUTORS
page.content: The ammenities counting was done by the staff and children of Hadley County Junior School. The following people were responsible for various written, photographic and editorial contributions: {Rev.Maurice Young,Vicar of Hadley { Parish;Bert Taylor,Head of Hadley { Junior;Eddie Phelps,Janet Hayward, { Jennie Tarrier and Glo Lewis,teachers { at Hadley Junior;Jaspal Singh Bansi, { David Williams,Hardev Singh Sanghera, { Khalid Hussain,Jane Dodd,Michelle { Wilkins,Daniel Shore,Andrew { Richards,Steven Bailey,Balwant { Rana,Emma Parker,Jonathan Beddoes and { Daljit Kaur Dhami,all pupils of { Hadley Junior School.
